title: SQLADD Keyword

metadata.description: Learn about SQLADD Keyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Reference

❯
ADD
The
ADD
command is used to add a column in an 
existing table.
Example
Add an "Email" column to the "Customers" table:
ALTER TABLE Customers
ADD Email varchar(255);

Reference

❯
★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers SQLADD Keyword concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use SQLADD Keyword effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of SQLADD Keyword and how to apply it in your projects.
